displayName.text: A Touch of Faith Hair Care Inc

formattedAddress: 1608-10 Amsterdam Ave Storefront 1, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1608-10 Amsterdam Ave Storefront 1, New York, NY 10031-6107, USA

originalText.text: Moet is awesome!  She gives so much information about how to care for your hair and on top of that my hair looks fabulous!! I definitely recommend a Touch of Faith especially if you want someone who is going to actually care about your hair and treat it with love.

text.text: Moet is awesome!  She gives so much information about how to care for your hair and on top of that my hair looks fabulous!! I definitely recommend a Touch of Faith especially if you want someone who is going to actually care about your hair and treat it with love.

originalText.text: Moet is an exceptional hairstylist who cares about hair health, in addition to the amazing styles she performs on natural, relaxed, and color-treated hair. She also does a great job educating clients about hair maintenance based on their unique needs, and her product line has been phenomenal for me as someone with very sensitive skin...I have used the A Touch of Faith on the scalp treatment for several years, and it has helped me manage scalp irritation and dryness, especially while maintaining protective styles or in-between appointments. I am also a fan of the whipped body butter, as it has a pleasant smell and locks in moisture for the full day (even in the winter months). Excited to try her other products soon!

text.text: Moet is an exceptional hairstylist who cares about hair health, in addition to the amazing styles she performs on natural, relaxed, and color-treated hair. She also does a great job educating clients about hair maintenance based on their unique needs, and her product line has been phenomenal for me as someone with very sensitive skin...I have used the A Touch of Faith on the scalp treatment for several years, and it has helped me manage scalp irritation and dryness, especially while maintaining protective styles or in-between appointments. I am also a fan of the whipped body butter, as it has a pleasant smell and locks in moisture for the full day (even in the winter months). Excited to try her other products soon!

originalText.text: I was first introduced to A Touch of Faith when my sister recommended the hair oil (fortifying on the scalp treatment). However, I recently got a full sew-in by Moet and it was the best experience I've ever had with a stylist. As soon as I walked in the shop, Moet was very welcoming and detailed with her explanations while doing my hair. She cares about ensuring healthy hair along with the end result! For my sew-in, I ordered the kinky straight bundles on the website and loveeeee it. I wanted a natural look and the extensions accomplished this along with being incredible quality. This was my first time going to Moet but it won't be my last. She's a stylist who genuinely cares about her clients, tailoring her approach to each head. I'm looking forward to continuing my hair journey with her!

originalText.text: Moet has been doing my hair for years and she provides the greatest Hair CARE — It’s not just a hair salon folks! .  She assessed the condition of my hair and recommended products to make it better.  I have natural hair and under Moet’s care, it has grown to lengths that I have never been able to achieve — EVER.  She’s done protect styles like wigs, crotchet and sew-ins, silk press with color and  in all of these styles she uses expert techniques that differ from other stylists in NYC — she makes those enhancements look incredibly real & very natural - I receive an insane amount of compliments on my hair by random people — women AND men!!

originalText.text: Moet really cares about the health of your hair. Went for a silk press & it came out great. The shampoo and conditioner she’s created still has my hair feeling soft, moisturized, and light.
